About Me

Hi, I am a self-taught Web Developer based in Mumbai, India.
Currently learning the front-end side of things, one step at a time. My primary focus is on UX/UI design. I have just started on this journey and I hope you will join in too.

My Workflow Process

Concepting and Prototyping

First we discuss about the various aspects of the website and create a draft

Creation and Deployment

After the draft is finalised then, the website is created and then deployed

Maintainance and Revision

Assistance will be provide after the site is deployed, and revisions will be done if needed

Portfolio

Photography Website
